text: Mike Walker Reports … There ’ s a new marshal galloping toward Dodge City, and his name ’ s … Blake Shelton! Western fans are thrilling at whispers that “ Gunsmoke ” — one of TV ’ s longest running series, with James Arness as Marshal Matt Dillon — will hit the big screen starring country crooner / “ The Voice ” stud Blake … and luscious squeeze Gwen Stefani! Secrets Of Blake & Gwen ’ s Love Shack Gone Bad! Said My Spy Onda Lotalot : “ Tons of movie idols — notably Bradley Cooper and Ben Affleck — are mulling the iconic role, but Blake ’ s country authenticity, good looks, humor and swagger make him a shoo - in! “ And sexy Gwen — who debuted her movie career in 2004
